name: powerpool-agent-v2
description: Decentralized network for guaranteed, automatic, gasless transactions execution and off-chain computations for Defi/Web3 apps and individuals.

scripts.postinstall: sed -n -e '/path/,/url/p' .gitmodules | sed 'N;s/\n/\$$$/' | while IFS= read -r line; do if [[ $line =~ (.*)\$\$\$(.*) ]] ; then path="$(echo ${BASH_REMATCH[1]} | sed 's/.*= //')"; url="$(echo ${BASH_REMATCH[2]} | sed 's/.*= //')"; if [ -d $path ] ; then start=$PWD; cd $path; git pull; cd $PWD; else git clone $url $path; fi fi done
